classtemplate.name: CallableClassMember
classtemplate.brief: A member function wrapper that takes a serialized input.
classtemplate.doc: This module should be benchmarked against the more general class fetch::rpc::Function and fetch::rpc::Function. If there is no notable perfomance difference this implementation should be dropped to keep the code base small and simple (TODO).

templatetypeparameter.name: C
templatetypeparameter.brief: is the class type to which the member function belongs.
